mapper.sql: id, name, type, color, text_color, created_at, updated_at
mapper.delete: delete from meta where id in (${ids})
mapper.insert: insert into meta (id, name, type, color, text_color, created_at, updated_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
text_color = #{textColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
